sentences.english: Well, do you have any questions?
sentences.chinese: 喚，你有什麼其他問題嗎？

sentences.english: Her daughters were eagerly called to partake of her joy.
sentences.chinese: 她喜出望外，急急忙忙喚女兒們來分享她這種愉快。

sentences.english: Five cities in the writing, the world in lock no sleep need.
sentences.chinese: 五城中鎖奇書，世間睡裏無人喚。

sentences.english: She beckoned her friends closer with a wave of her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她招了招手，喚她朋友們過來。

sentences.english: If you need help, please push the bell—button.
sentences.chinese: 您有事情喚服務員，請按電鈴。

sentences.english: She handed a river Zhi orchid, then then and loudly called servant.
sentences.chinese: 她扶了江芷蘭，然後便大聲喚管家。

sentences.english: He was routed out of bed by the doorbell at daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 黎明時他被門鈴聲從牀上喚起來。

sentences.english: If you want an attendant, Please push the bell.
sentences.chinese: 您有事喚服務員，請按電鈴。
